plugin.name: Alternative Text Generator
settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure settings to enable AI-powered alternative text generation for images.
settings.licenseKey.title: License Key
settings.licenseKey.label: License Key
settings.licenseKey.hint: Enter your license key to activate your subscription and track usage.
settings.licenseKey.howToGet: Get your license key from your dashboard
settings.licenseKey.save.error: Failed to save license key. Please check if it's valid.
settings.subscription.title: Subscription
settings.subscription.cancelledDescripti: Your subscription is still active until {date}. You can reactivate it anytime.
Your subscription is still active until the end of the billing period. You can reactivate it anytime.
settings.subscription.upgradeDescription: Upgrade to have a higher limit of alternative text generation and advanced features.
settings.subscription.alreadyActive: You already have an active subscription!
settings.subscription.pricingError: Unable to open pricing page. Please try again.
settings.subscription.portalError: Failed to open subscription management portal
settings.usage.title: Usage
settings.autoTagging.title: Auto-Tagging
settings.autoTagging.description: Automatically generate alternative text when images are uploaded to the Media Library.
settings.bulkProcessing.title: Parallel Processing
settings.bulkProcessing.description: Process multiple images in parallel when generating alternative text in bulk.
settings.bulkProcessing.error: Failed to update bulk processing setting
bulk.title: Alternative Text Generator
bulk.description: Select images to generate AI-powered alternative text.
bulk.noImages: No images found in the Media Library.
bulk.noSelection: Select at least one image to generate alternative text.
bulk.noLicenseKey: Please configure your license key in settings to generate alternative text.
bulk.error: An error occurred during generation. Please try again.
bulk.limitReached: You've reached your generation limit ({used}/{limit}). Upgrade your plan to continue generating.
bulk.upgradeDialog.title: Usage Limit Reached
bulk.upgradeDialog.description: You've used all {used} of your {limit} available generations this month. Upgrade your plan to continue generating alternative text.
